meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Brittany Franckowiak Pat McNamee Lisa Evans Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7560.

td.p: Brittany Franckowiak, a high school biology teacher from Laurel, Maryland
Pat McNamee, a CPA from McLean, Virginia
Lisa Evans, an office manager from Easthampton, Massachusetts (whose 2-day cash winnings total $62,402)

tr.td: QUICK GEOGRAPHY
TV IN THE STREAM
ORANGE
SCARY READING
"OOP"s
NOW YOU'VE STEPPED IN IT

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: [To Pat] What is it?)
(Pat: "Sucking" in my stomach during the show.)
...
(Alex: [To Lisa] The author in this case was Sylvia Plath, who committed suicide shortly after writing The Glass Jar--[*], [*].)
BrittanyWhat is the Glass Cage?
$8,800
PatWhat is I\'ve been sucking
$5,001
LisaWhat is To Kill A Mockingbird?
$11,910
The Bell Jar')

tr.td: BOOKS OF THE 1960s
"Wherever I sat...I would be sitting under the same glass" this, the title of the author's only novel
Lisa
Pat
Brittany
2nd place: $2,000
New champion: $7,599
3rd place: $1,000
Lisa
Pat
Brittany
